Actions.Name: Get Workflow
Actions.Description: Gets a workflow definition by ID.

Actions.Name: Get Workflows
Actions.Description: Get a list of available workflows.

Actions.Name: Finish Server Event
Actions.Description: Send a finish response to an async server task awaiting a response

Actions.Name: Get Server Event
Actions.Description: Gets a server event by serial number.

Actions.Name: Start Workflow
Actions.Description: Creates and starts a new workflow instance.

Actions.Name: Get Tasks
Actions.Description: Obtain a list of tasks available to the connected user.

Actions.Name: Get Task
Actions.Description: Gets a task by serial number.

Actions.Name: Get Task Actions
Actions.Description: Gets a list of actions for the task.

Actions.Name: Assign Task
Actions.Description: Assigns a task to the current user.

Actions.Name: Redirect Task
Actions.Description: Sends a task to another person.

Actions.Name: Sleep Task
Actions.Description: Sleeps a task for a duration, either number of seconds or until a date.
